ns2:li.ns2:em: Assignment: organization-defined management, operational, and technical information system security controls

ns2:li: Assesses as feasible, the effectiveness of security controls at alternate work sites; and
Provides a means for employees to communicate with information security personnel in case of security incidents or problems.

ns2:p.#text: Alternate work sites may include, for example, government facilities or private residences of employees. The organization may define different sets of security controls for specific alternate work sites or types of sites.
